remarks: Property of a finitely generated left (sub-)module, with a relaxed constraint on the spanning vectors.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
islssfg.x $e |- X = ( W |`s U ) $.
islssfg.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
islssfg.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
islssfg2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
islssfg2 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. LFinGen <-> E. b e. ( ~P B i^i Fin ) ( N ` b ) = U ) ) $.
$d N b $.
$d S b $.
$d U b $.
$d W b $.
$d X b $.
